verbs.description: The courts [V: must] now decide whether President Trump has the power to break one of America ’s oldest and proudest conservation laws .
[ARG0: The courts] [ARGM-MOD: must] [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: decide] [ARG1: whether President Trump has the power to break one of America ’s oldest and proudest conservation laws] .
The courts must now decide whether [ARG0: President Trump] [V: has] [ARG1: the power to break one of America ’s oldest and proudest conservation laws] .
The courts must now decide whether [ARG0: President Trump] has the power to [V: break] [ARG1: one of America ’s oldest and proudest conservation laws] .
